attributes.action: Stop call centres based in India phoning trying to sell unwanted products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have received calls from an overseas call centre claiming to be from a company called Money Management. We get about 3 calls a day trying to sell Individual Voluntary Agreements which they claim is part of a government scheme. They will not take no for an answer, they just keep calling.  Because they are calling from abroad the TPS cannot help. They are harassing us and we can't stop them!!
